text.data: Matelite: Looks like the Imperial army's still around!![end1][end]
We're gonna kick the crap out of them[0xfc][0x1] and take back Kahna's flagship!![end1][end]
Enemy approaching!! The Resistance is attacking?![end]
Yo, I'm the boss here!![0xfc][0x1] I won the position in the javelin-throwing competition!![end]
Take good care of your dragons!! Use the dragon commands properly...[end1][end]
If our dragons are slain in battle, we won't be able to use our magic and techs! So be careful!![end1][end]
Matelite: OK!![0xfc][0x1] I'm taking charge of the ship!![end1][end]
